meanings.definition: A government or social system dominated by slaveholders.
meanings.sent1: The slavocracy controlled all aspects of the society.
meanings.sent2: The slavocracy profited from the labor of enslaved individuals.
meanings.sent3: The slavocracy had a meeting to discuss their 'slave management strategies'.
meanings.sent4: The grip of the slavocracy tightened on the oppressed population.
meanings.sent5: The legacy of the slavocracy haunted the nation for generations.

meanings.definition: The class of slaveholders in a society.
meanings.sent1: Members of the slavocracy lived in luxury while others suffered.
meanings.sent2: The slavocracy held immense power over the enslaved population.
meanings.sent3: The slavocracy hosted a 'slave owner of the year' competition.
meanings.sent4: The influence of the slavocracy extended far beyond their plantations.
meanings.sent5: The wealth of the slavocracy was built on the backs of the oppressed.
